name: Making Public Policy Work
description: How do we know what kinds of public policy will work and what will not? How do we assess the effectiveness of a policy?  An historical examination of ways in which Canadian governments have addressed a range of policy problems. Case studies of areas of federal and provincial activity today. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
exclusions: Innis One, Munk One, New One, SMC One, UC One, Vic One, Woodsworth One
